DESCRIPTION: Expend your topmost #yReagent by flinging it at a random enemy, inflicting #b4 damage.
Imbalanced creatures take #b50% more damage from #yMix effects.
Marked creatures will always be hit by #yFling. Only one enemy can be afflicted with Marked at a time.
Expend your #b2 topmost stockpiled #yReagents to produce an effect. Only works when at least #b2 #yReagents are stockpiled.
An alchemical ingredient. Combine #b2 Reagents with #yMix to produce a variety of effects.
Volatility adds additional damage to #yMix effects.
